mapper.insert: insert into users(user_name, user_password, user_nickname) value (#{name}, #{password}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: select user_id as id, user_name as name, user_password as password, user_nickname as nickname from users where user_name = #{name}
select user_id as id, user_nickname as nickname from users where user_name = #{username} and user_password = #{password}
